concept.title: Checkpoint Storage for Mesos
concept.shortdesc: When running a cluster pipeline, the generates and stores checkpoint metadata.

conbody.p: When you run a cluster pipeline using Spark Streaming on Mesos, you need to use a location on HDFS or Amazon S3 to ensure high availability.
Cluster pipelines that run on Yarn and Spark Streaming or MapReduce store the checkpoint metadata on HDFS.
